程序包 com.teamone.unitask.onboard.security.jwt

类 JwtUtils

java.lang.Object
com.teamone.unitask.onboard.security.jwt.JwtUtils
@Component public class JwtUtils extends Object
Utility class for handling JWT (JSON Web Token) in the Spring Security implementation.

  • 方法详细资料

    • generateJwtToken

      public String generateJwtToken(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Generates a JWT token based on the user authentication details.
      参数:
      authentication - The authentication details of the user.
      返回:
      The generated JWT token.

    • getUserNameFromJwtToken

      public String getUserNameFromJwtToken(String token)
      Retrieves the email address from the JWT token.
      参数:
      token - The JWT token.
      返回:
      The email address extracted from the token.

    • validateJwtToken

      public boolean validateJwtToken(String authToken)
      Validates the given JWT token.
      参数:
      authToken - The JWT token to be validated.
      返回:
      True if the token is valid; otherwise, false.
